title: Royal Edinburgh; Her Saints, Kings, Prophets and Poets
author: Oliphant, Mrs. (Margaret)
snippet: The Grahams of Strathearn in the north had fallen speciallyunder the rectifying process of James's new laws of property: and out ofthis house there suddenly arose the tragic figure of an avenger whosebrief but terrible career occupies but a single page in history, yetcontains all the elements of a fatal drama.
